name: Performance management - Sending the quarterly forms to complete 1/3
description:
Every quarter, send the Google Forms used for performance reviews to the team leader/manager to ensure that all the reviews get completed in the given time-frame. For this template to work correctly, please use this Google Form for 3 team members. You can edit the form and the subsequent scenarios once all have been built.
http://www.make.com/en/integration/10491-performance-management-sending-the-quarterly-forms-to-complete-1-3?templatePublicId=10491
